import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import{createLogger}from'redux-logger';import rootReducer from'./reducers';var loggerMiddleware=createLogger();var middleware=[];//For redux dev tools
var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;export default function configureStore(preloadedState){return createStore(rootReducer,preloadedState,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware.concat([loggerMiddleware]))));}
